SEARCH
Package com.app.repository

Interface AnswerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<Answer,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnswerRepositoryImpl
public interface AnswerRepository extends CrudRepository<Answer,Long>
Repository interface for managing Answer entities. Extends the generic CrudRepository for basic CRUD operations and provides additional methods specific to Answer operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Answer>
    deleteByQuestId(Long questId)
    Deletes all answers associated with a specific quest ID.
    List<Answer>
    findByQuestId(Long questId)
    Retrieves a list of answers associated with a specific quest ID.

    Methods inherited from interface com.app.repository.impl.generic.CrudRepository

    delete, findAll, findAllById, findById, findLast, save, saveAll

  • Method Details

    • findByQuestId

      List<Answer> findByQuestId(Long questId)
      Retrieves a list of answers associated with a specific quest ID.
      Parameters:
      questId - the ID of the quest for which to find answers
      Returns:
      a list of Answer objects related to the specified quest

    • deleteByQuestId

      List<Answer> deleteByQuestId(Long questId)
      Deletes all answers associated with a specific quest ID.
      Parameters:
      questId - the ID of the quest whose answers are to be deleted
      Returns:
      a list of Answer objects that were deleted
